text: John Joseph Cranley (born February 28, 1974) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 69th Mayor of Cincinnati, Ohio from 2013 until 2022. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the Cincinnati City Council. He is a candidate for the Democratic Party's nomination for Governor of Ohio in the 2022 election. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Cincinnati Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Cincinnati
title: John Cranley
